content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you for your interest in my apartment, Mr. Li. Based on the information you have provided, I am willing to negotiate the rental price with you. May I ask what is your proposed rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I want to rent this apartment for the lowest price possible. My goal is to save as much money as possible.

Do you have any specific requirements or expectations for the rental price?
name: Baihu Li from China

content:
Thank you for your response, Mr. Li. I understand that you are looking for the lowest possible rental price. However, as a landlord, I have certain expectations for the rental price that I am willing to accept. While I do want to maximize my gains, I am also looking for a responsible and reliable tenant who will take care of the apartment and pay rent on time.

Based on the size and location of the apartment, I am expecting a rental price of at least 500 Euros per month. This price takes into account the costs of utilities, maintenance, and other expenses associated with the apartment. Of course, I am open to discussing any additional terms or conditions that may be necessary to come to an agreement.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I can accept the rental price of 500 Euros per month.

So, I agree to the price of 500 Euros per month.

Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

I will sign the lease agreement and pay the first month's rent of 500 Euros on or before the move-in date.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you, Mr. Li, for agreeing to the rental price of 500 Euros per month. I appreciate your understanding and cooperation in this matter. Once you have signed the lease agreement and paid the first month's rent, you will be able to move into the apartment. I look forward to having you as my tenant and hope that you enjoy your stay in my apartment.
name: Heinrich Heine
